hdb.table.column

Interface ColumnList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Column>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HarambeColumnList

    public interface ColumnList
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Column>
    Represents a list of colums to be stored in a Table in the HarambeDB hdb. This class is used to represent the columns in a Table. You can add new columns in the database even if you have already added row to it and the rows should update their fields to match the columns specified here. It is worth to mention that the column itself does not store the name of that particular column, instead they are stored in a ColumnList, that means that the Class Column and the Class ColumnList depend on each other, though this is considered a bad OOP practice, this way we avoid data redundancy.

    This class is a member of the HarambeDB database framework.

    See Also:
    Column
